name: .PDC
summary: Learn about .PDC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To open a PDC file, you must be authorized to do so. If you've been sent a PDC file via email, it should be accompanied by an LLV file. To open your PDC file:
Double-click the LLV file you received.
The PDC file will then open in Locklizard PDC Viewer.
If your PDC file is not accompanied by an LLV file, you should reach out to the organization that sent you the PDC file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pdc file in Locklizard Safeguard PDF Viewer
images.caption: PDC file open in Locklizard Safeguard PDF Viewer
